advancement.ancient_aether.ancient_aethe: Find all biomes added by the Ancient Aether Add-On
advancement.ancient_aether.cracked_slide: Mine a Cracked Slider with a Gravitite Pickaxe
advancement.ancient_aether.find_ancient_: Find an Ancient Valkyrie Library in a Quicksoil Desert
lore.block.ancient_aether.holystone_bric: A fancy Holystone Brick variant that can be rotated in various different directions.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sentry_stone_m: A fancy Carved Stone variant that can be rotated in various different directions.
lore.block.ancient_aether.angelic_stone_: A fancy Angelic Stone variant that can be rotated in various different directions.
lore.block.ancient_aether.hellfire_stone: A fancy Hellfire Stone variant that can be rotated in various different directions.
lore.block.ancient_aether.gale_stone_mos: A fancy Gale Stone variant that can be rotated in various different directions.
lore.block.ancient_aether.holystone_lant: A decoration block that is crafted from Holystone, Skyroot Sticks and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sentry_lantern: A decoration block that is crafted from Carved Stone, Sentry Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.angelic_lanter: A decoration block that is crafted from Angelic Stone, Light Angelic Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.hellfire_lante: A decoration block that is crafted from Hellfire Stone, Light Hellfire Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.gale_lantern: A decoration block that is crafted from Gale Stone, Light Gale Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.aether_quartz_: An ore that is a source of Quartz in the Aether.
lore.block.ancient_aether.quicksoil_bric: A building block that is created by combining Quickstone and Quicksoil that is exactly as slippery as Quicksoil.
lore.block.ancient_aether.quickstone: A block that generates in the Quicksoil Desert that makes the biome easier to traverse as it isn't slippery. It can also be used to craft Quicksoil Bricks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.quicksoil_bric: Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
lore.block.ancient_aether.aether_cactus: A spiky plant found in the Quicksoil Desert. You can remove its spikes by stripping it with an axe. It is also a great source for Lime Dye.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_aethe: A version of the Aether Cactus that doesn't hurt you which makes it perfect for building cactus houses. It is also a great source for Lime Dye.
lore.block.ancient_aether.cactus_flower: A nice decoration block found on top of Giant Aether Cacti. It can be craft into Cactus Flower Petals that have a lot different uses.
lore.block.ancient_aether.golden_cactus_: A rare variant of the Cactus Flower that generates on top of Quicksoil Desert Gold Dungeons
lore.block.ancient_aether.small_aether_c: A small version version of the regular Aether cactus that can be crafted into Red Dye.
lore.block.ancient_aether.moonlit_tulip: A rare tulip that generates in the Highlands Taiga. It can either be crafted into Blue Dye or enchanted into Lapis Lazuli.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_blossom: A rare flower that generates in the Sakura Jungle. It can either be crafted into Pink Dye. Although some of them might not be what they seem.
lore.block.ancient_aether.trapped_sakura: It looks like Sakura Blossoms but in reality it's a Rootling in disguise.
lore.block.ancient_aether.edelweiss: A flower that generates in the colder biomes of the Aether such as the Highland Taiga and the Sakura Jungle. It can either be crafted into White Dye.
lore.block.ancient_aether.enchanted_sent: The enchanted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Libraries
lore.block.ancient_aether.blighted_sentr: The blighted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Laboratories
lore.block.ancient_aether.highlands_pine: The log of a tree found in a very cold region of the Aether, the Frosty Highlands. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_highl: A Highlands Pine Log that had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.highlands_pine: A building block crafted from Highlands Pine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_highl: A building block crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.highlands_pine: Crafted from Highlands Pine Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_highl: Crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.highlands_pine: Crafted from Highlands Pine Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_highl: Crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.highlands_pine: Highlands Pine Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Highlands Pine Logs, and make a great building material.
These leaves generate with Highlands Pine Trees. They can drop Highlands Pine Saplings when decaying.
These small blue saplings will grow into Highlands Pine Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks and Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Sticks and Highlands Pine Planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_log: The log of a tree found in a very rare biome of the Aether, the Sakura Jungle. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sakura Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_sakur: A Sakura Log that had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sakura Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_wood: A building block crafted from Sakura Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sakura Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_sakur: A building block crafted from Stripped Sakura Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sakura Planks.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_log_wal: Crafted from Sakura Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_sakur: Crafted from Stripped Sakura Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_wood_wa: Crafted from Sakura Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.stripped_sakur: Crafted from Stripped Sakura Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_planks: Sakura Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Sunroot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_leaves: These leaves generate with Sakura Trees. They can drop Sakura Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_sapling: These small pink saplings will grow into huge Sakura Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_button: Crafted from Sakura Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_door: Crafted from Sakura Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_fence: Crafted from Sakura Planks and Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_fence_g: Crafted from Sticks and Sakura Planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_pressur: Crafted from Sakura Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_slab: Crafted from Sakura Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_stairs: Crafted from Sakura Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_trapdoo: Crafted from Sakura Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.ancient_aether.sakura_sign: Crafted from Sakura Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.ancient_aether.cracked_slider: A failed experiment of the Ancient Valkyries that can only be mined by Gravitite or better pickaxes. It also some Redstone functionality.
lore.block.ancient_aether.broken_enchant: Found at the entrances of Ancient Valkyrie Libraries, this block can be unlocked by Enchanted Sentry Runes.
lore.block.ancient_aether.broken_blighte: Found at the entrances of the Valkyrian Depths, this block can be unlocked by Blighted Sentry Runes.
lore.block.ancient_aether.enchanted_obel: A cool decoration block which can only be mined with a Gravitite Pickaxe or better.
lore.block.ancient_aether.blighted_obeli: A cool decoration block which can only be mined with a Gravitite Pickaxe or better.
lore.item.ancient_aether.aechor_ice_crea: A sweat dessert crafted by putting Aechor Petals, Sugar, Icestone and a Skyroot Bucket in a Crafting Table
lore.item.ancient_aether.cactus_flower_i: A sweat dessert crafted by putting Cactus Petals Petals, Sugar, Icestone and a Skyroot Bucket in a Crafting Table
lore.item.ancient_aether.enchanted_sentr: Found in the Ancient Sentry Weapon Laboratory, this rune unlocks Broken Enchanted Obelisks.
lore.item.ancient_aether.blighted_sentry: Found in the Ancient Valkyrie Library, this rune unlocks Broken Blighted Obelisks.
lore.item.ancient_aether.cactus_flower_p: Crafted from Cactus Flowers or by converting Aechor Petals using a Remedy Bucket, this item can be enchanted into Redstone Dust.
lore.item.ancient_aether.raw_buffalo_rib: Dropped by the tough Highlands Buffalos, these ribs can be cooked into Cooked Buffalo Ribs which are a good food source.
lore.item.ancient_aether.cooked_buffalo_: A good food source made by cooking Raw Buffalo Ribs. They can also be crafted into 4 singular Buffalo Ribs which give more Hunger Points but less Saturation.
lore.item.ancient_aether.buffalo_rib: Singular Buffalo Ribs can be eaten faster and give more Hunger Points but less Saturation than an entire Buffalo Rib Cage.
lore.item.ancient_aether.highlands_pine_: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.ancient_aether.sakura_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.ancient_aether.highlands_pine_: A Highlands Pine Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.ancient_aether.sakura_chest_bo: A Sakura Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
